name: Spring Home Rotti Paratha Onion
description: Enjoy Spring Home’s healthier choice option of this crispy and flaky flatbread that is imbued with onion. 64 layers of crispiness. Flaky on the outside, soft on the inside. No cooking oil needed. Cooking Method: Oven Bake, Pan Fry, Air Fry *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
